name: Football Referee
summary: Football Referee is a sports video game that simulates association football refereeing. By playing the Football Referee game, the player takes over the referee’s job which includes going through a pre-kick off checklist and then making decisions on situations that happen during a football match. The decisions made by the user (the referee) will alter and affect the upcoming scenes. Each decision will have a rank. The average of all decisions the user makes during the course of a match will result in their match rank which decides qualification for the next level. At the end of each level, incorrect decisions will be highlighted and the user will be informed of the correct decisions.
